author: forthommel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces an interface to the [CepGen](https://cepgen.hepforge.org/) central exclusive processes event generator described in [Comput. Phys. Commun. 271 (2022)](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cpc.2021.108225), and introduced at [a CMS-PH generator meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1335023/contributions/5619914) last October.

It is shipped with generator fragments for a LPAIR and a PPtoFF single-dissociative generation.

Requires CepGen v1.2.0, added to `cmsdist` in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9030.

#### PR validation:

Shipped in generator fragments seem to be producing something consistent :-)
```bash
cmsDriver.py Configuration/Generator/python/CepGen_pptoff_GamGamToLL_singlediss_13TeV_cfi.py --conditions auto:run2_mc -s GEN --datatier GEN -n 10 --eventcontent RAWSIM --no_exec
cmsDriver.py Configuration/Generator/python/CepGen_LPAIR_GamGamToLL_singlediss_13TeV_cfi.py --conditions auto:run2_mc -s GEN --datatier GEN -n 10 --eventcontent RAWSIM --no_exec
```
title: CepGen generator interface
